ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: I would have liked to have a drink or two.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: If I had been at a pub or club I would have wanted a drink.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: I had planned to drink alcohol.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: I would have accepted a drink if one had been offered to me.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: If I had been at a party I would have had a drink without thinking twice.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: My desire to drink seemed overwhelming.

Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: I wanted to drink alcohol so much that if I started drinking I would have found it difficult to stop.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: I was thinking about alcohol a lot of the time.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: I wanted to drink as soon as I had the chance.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: I avoided people who were likely to offer me a drink.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: I deliberately occupied myself so I would not drink alcohol.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: I was thinking about the benefits of being sober.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: I avoided places in which I might have been tempted to drink alcohol.
Consider your thoughts on alcohol over the PREVIOUS WEEK. Please rate how strongly you agree with each item: The bad things that could happen if I drank alcohol were fresh in my mind.
